issue.title: [Java][Gandiva] Create single Gandiva jar for MacOS and Linux
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12591](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12591). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Today, there are two different tasks that generate Gandiva's jars for **MacOS** and **Linux.** The objective is to create a single jar with the shared lib for the two operating systems.
